DataModelParadigm.comment: Each room is a digital space where people colalborate, and it corresponds with a document.

ExistingDatabaseSupport.comment: Does not require a datastore, but you can migrate or automatically sync to your database with webhooks/REST API

QueryAPI.comment: JS: via subscription. React: via selector hooks, mutation callbacks. Automatically converts live data structures to JSON for easy UI. Hooks update automatically on changes. Can retrieve deep into the data structure without causing unnecessary renders.

LocalRefreshLatency.comment: Changes on the client: <1ms. Other clients receive updates up to 60 times per second(16ms), configurable.

OfflineReads.comment: Previously accessed data is stored in-memory

OfflineWrites.comment: Full cached writes, stored in-memory, server will resolve conflict.

DataSize.comment: It depends on the in memory size of the Storage document.

ConflictHandling.data: Automatic via LWW or fractional indexing
ConflictHandling.comment: Values: LWW, LiveObject: LWW at attribute level, LiveMap: LWW at entry level, LiveList: fractional indexing (for insertions) or LWW (for replacements)

data.ServerToClient: ops, acks, and fix-ops (when conflict was resolved)

AuthorizationPermissions.comment: ID tokens for permissions based on a per-room basis. Access tokens for permissions granted directly in the token

Components.comment: All Liveblocks products integrate into each other. Learn more about the other products on [liveblocks.io](https://liveblocks.io).

CLI.data: CLI for installing examples, updating packages, creating your typescript config.
